title: Stormrazor was a mistake
body: Who thought this item was a good idea and healthy for the game?

replies.body: Ha, you think that's bad? Wait for the the new fighter items planned for 8.12.

> [{quoted}](name=bigtendie,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wlsr77FO,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-31T20:20:30.276+0000)
>
> Ha, you think that's bad? Wait for the the new fighter items planned for 8.12.

Those are dumb too.
Would you care to explain why it's unhealthy?
I had the same thought, admittedly.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wlsr77FO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-05-31T20:13:16.313+0000)
>
> Nerf Scuttle.

Thats what im saying my dude
